description.lead: Discover the potential use and value of your land.
description.body: Accurately determine the soil type and other features of your land to gain insights for grazing and farming options, carbon sequestration, and more.

location.body: enter a search term or coordinates in the search bar, or tap the location icon <icon /> on the map to use your GPS.

search.body: in the site list by name or notes.

learn_more.body: in the side menu to the left or at <landpks href='https://landpotential.org'>landpotential.org</landpks>

empty.info:
You have not created any sites. Create a site with the button above or by finding the location on the map.

A site allows you to collect and save data, learn more about your land and its potential, and share with others.

search.no_matches: No sites match the current search and filter options.

none.header: You don't currently have any projects
none.info: A project is a group of sites you can manage on your own or with a team. Projects allow you to configure data inputs, add team members and sites, and view audit logs.

settings.archive_description: The project will be moved to Archived Projects, making it read-only. Team members can access the data, and project managers can restore it at any time. Public projects that are archived will remain viewable on data portals.
settings.delete_description:
This will permanently delete the projectâ€™s data, as well as all of its sites and site data. This cannot be undone.

Alternatively, project managers can transfer the sites out of this project to retain their data.

sites.empty: This project doesn't currently have any sites added to it. You can transfer existing LandPKS sites or create new sites.

transfer_sites.heading: Transfer existing sites
transfer_sites.description: Choose existing LandPKS sites you manage to transfer to this project. Note that only those who have access to the project will be able to access the sites in the project.

form.name_min_length_error: Project name must be at least {{min}} characters
form.name_max_length_error: Project name must be at most {{max}} characters
form.description_max_length_error: Project description must be at most {{max}} characters

search.no_matches: No projects match the current search and filter options.

login.subtitle:

of your land
login.description: LandPKS is a Terraso soil science tool.
